skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Inflicts 50% less damage against targets who have active buffs.
skills.name: Wind Slash

skills.desc: Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff and a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
skills.name: Last Stand

skills.desc: Immune to [Stun], [Freeze], [Sleep], [Provoke], [Block Active Skills], [Block Passive Skills], [Fear], and [True Fear] debuffs. Also immune to HP exchange effects, HP balancing effects, and cooldown increasing effects.
skills.name: Almighty Immunity [Passive]

skills.desc: Damage from Continuous Damage decreased by 30%.
skills.name: Continuous Damage Resistance I
